tool.name: split otu table by taxonomy
tool.description: Script to split a single OTU table into multiple tables based on the taxonomy at some user-specified depth.
tool.command:
split_otu_table_by_taxonomy.py -i $input_fp -o split_otu_table_by_taxonomy_output -L $level #if str($md_identifier): --md_identifier=$md_identifier #end if
#if $md_as_string: --md_as_string #end if ; compress_path.py -i split_otu_table_by_taxonomy_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -i/--input_fp: the input otu table in BIOM format
param.name: input_fp

param.label: -L/--level: the taxonomic level to split at
param.name: level

param.label: --md_identifier: the relevant observation metadat key [default: taxonomy]
param.name: md_identifier

param.label: --md_as_string: metadata is included as string [default: metadata is included as list]
param.name: md_as_string
